Headline: #9 Ashland Temporary Northbound Reroute near 63rd/Ashland
ShortDescription: Northbound 9 Ashland buses are temporarily rerouted via Ashland, 63rd, Damen, 59th and Ashland: due to, street blockage near 63rd/Ashland.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #9 Ashland buses are temporarily rerouted via Ashland, 63rd, Damen, 59th and Ashland: due to, street blockage near 63rd/Ashland.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
